scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary kneeling in a blue robe, her hands clasped in prayer. To her right, a crowned figure, likely God the Father, sits on a throne, wearing a red robe and holding a globe. He gestures towards Mary with his right hand. Behind Mary, an angel with golden wings stands on a raised platform, holding a crown. The background features a starry blue sky and a green patterned tapestry. The overall composition is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
